biotools.summary:
Gene regulation inference from single-cell RNA-seq data with linear differential equations and velocity inference.

Gene Regulation Inference for Single-cell with LInear differential equations and velocity inference.

Single-cell RNA sequencing (scRNA-seq) offers new possibilities to infer gene regulation networks (GRN) for biological processes involving a notion of time, such as cell differentiation or cell cycles.
